headline: Shenandoah Telecommunications Appoints Angela M. Olsen as General Counsel
summary: EDINBURG, Va., Aug. 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Shenandoah Telecommunications Company (“Shentel” or the “Company”) (Nasdaq: SHEN) announces that Angela M. Olsen has joined the Company as Vice President-Legal and General Counsel. Ms. Olsen will be a member of the senior executive team, reporting to the President and Chief Executive Officer. Ms. Olsen has over 25 years of legal experience in corporate, private practice and government legal settings, across a range of industries. Ms. Olsen previou
